explains: n. （美）棒球场；活动领域；可变通范围

sentences.en: If you said five million you'd be in the ballpark.
sentences.cn: 如果你说的是五百万，那就差不多了。

sentences.en: The offers for the contract were all in the same ballpark.
sentences.cn: 本合同的所有开价均在同一范围内。

sentences.en: I can't give you anything more than just sort of a ballpark figure.
sentences.cn: 我只能给你一个大概的数字。
